name: Viking defense
description:
Control:

  • WASD to move character.
  • Left click to throw out axe.
  • Right click to use time slow.
  • Blue bar is your time slow charge, Red bar is tree health

Tips & Tricks:

  • Barbarian is going to destroy your trees, defeat them!
  • There're TWO trees, one is in the front of your spawn point, another is on the right side over the bridge.
  • Fireball is FATAL, one touch one kill.
  • Right click can make time slow, use it when you in emergency situations.

How long can you hold?

Programmer & level design: Kiloyd
